abstract: New York’s attorney general slightly overstated the number of million-dollar-plus bonuses at JPMorgan Chase in Thursday’s report on bank compensation. DealBook has the real figure.
snippet: New York’s attorney general slightly overstated the number of million-dollar-plus bonuses at JPMorgan Chase in Thursday’s report on bank compensation. DealBook has the real figure.
lead_paragraph: From Louise Story, a DealBook colleague:

headline.main: Not Quite So Many Million-Dollar Bonuses at JPMorgan
